Values

SolarAMC primarily focus upon preserving the asset quality over long term tenure of 10-25 years by strictly maintaining

  • Standardization in day to day operations processes
  • Automating them and,
  • Knowledge storage at cloud

Product

Key Features:
  • Automated Scheduling
  • Automated Reporting
  • Instant Manpower Management
  • Performance Analytics
  • Plant History Management
  • Documentation (BOM, BOQ, Specification Sheet(s),etc.) Management
  • Live Streaming of service directly from plant

Services

Our complete package offers full fledged asset management service. There is also an option for client based customized package. Whether you are long term client or for instant needs we have something for everyone in every budget.
